ComicInfo.Title: All in a Sea of Wonders
ComicInfo.Summary: All in a Sea of Wonders: After mediating a conflict between Satarrans and Catullans, the Cerritos is dispatched on a second contact mission to the Qvanti system. While enroute, the lower decks crew enjoy down time on the holodeck, first in a Dixon Hill adventure, then in a Sherlock Holmes adventure. Beckett tries to show how the holodeck safeguards will prevent them from creating a real threat, however, during a glitch with the ship's systems, the safeguards are overwritten, and they accidentally create a sentient Dracula.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:23:40. [CVDB947280] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 15:50:05. [Issue ID 2430130]
